text: @10DowningStreet @BorisJohnson Here is a thought: why don't you remove #DominicCummings from the #covid19 task force and just keep him as adviser for the #Brexit talks? Even through, strictly speaking, he has broken no rule, there's no getting people to understand this. And unfortunately it looks bad.
